AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: ReassignOrphanRecurringGift Add Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Form to allow user to reassign an orphaned recurring gift.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_REASSIGN_ORPHAN_RECURRINGGIFT ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, -- SPONSORSHIPID of the sponsorship user is viewing @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @GIFTLOOKUPID nvarchar(100) = '' -- recurring gift lookup id user enters into form ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- ensure we have a sponsorship id: if @CONTEXTID is null RAISERROR ('No sponsorship ID was given. Something went wrong, be sure you have a Sponsorship selected.', 16, 1)
-- call the sproc to perform the work: exec dbo.USR_USP_MOVE_RECURRING_GIFT @lookupId = @GIFTLOOKUPID, @sponsorshipId = @CONTEXTID
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
